description: Evaluation dataset for LUTE web corpus with expected source sections.

dataset.query: What documents are required for admission to LUTE?
dataset.groundTruth: Required admission documents are listed on the admissions documents page.

dataset.query: Where can I find the main admission rules for 2026?
dataset.groundTruth: Main admission rules are published on the page "Основні положення правил прийому".

dataset.query: Which page contains normative documents of the university?
dataset.groundTruth: Normative documents are aggregated on the page "Нормативні документи".

dataset.query: Is there an order about the first semester of 2025-2026 in LUTE normative documents?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations page includes an order about organizing the first semester of 2025-2026.

dataset.query: Is there a separate block of wartime normative documents?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations page has a dedicated section for wartime normative documents.

dataset.query: Does LUTE publish quarantine-related regulations?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations page includes a separate section for quarantine period regulations.

dataset.query: Are there educational activity regulations in the LUTE normative list?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, there is a dedicated educational activity section with many regulations.

dataset.query: Is there a policy on the language of the educational process?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations list includes a document titled "Мова освітнього процесу".

dataset.query: Is there a regulation on academic mobility at LUTE?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations list includes both internal and international academic mobility regulations.

dataset.query: Does LUTE have a policy for recognizing non-formal education results?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the normative list includes a regulation for recognition of learning outcomes from non-formal and informal education.

dataset.query: Can I find a regulation on stakeholder surveys about education quality?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations list contains a document on stakeholder surveys about quality of education.

dataset.query: Is there an item about student surveys "Vikladach ochyma zdobuvachiv"?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations list includes student survey regulations under that name.

dataset.query: Does the corpus include a regulation about soft skills policy?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, there is a normative document about policy for soft skills development.

dataset.query: Where is information about LUTE material and technical base located?
dataset.groundTruth: Information is available on the page "Матеріально-технічна база".

dataset.query: Is the admissions page linking to official EDBO portal?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, admissions-related blocks include a link to vstup.edbo.gov.ua.

dataset.query: Is there an academic integrity related page in the university corpus?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the source list includes a dedicated page for academic integrity materials.

dataset.query: Does LUTE provide regulations for exam commissions?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the educational activity regulations include a document about exam commission organization.

dataset.query: Is there a regulation for repeated control measures?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, the regulations list includes a document on repeated control measures for students.

dataset.query: Are there regulations for educational programs and guarantors?
dataset.groundTruth: Yes, educational activity regulations include documents on educational programs and program guarantors.

dataset.query: Are scholarship programs explicitly listed in the current extracted pages?
dataset.groundTruth: If not present in the extracted sections, the assistant should state that the information is not found in the provided documents.
